website_summaries.verdict: If you need a double Baby Jogger, this model is a well-made investment that offers many convenient features.
pros: A top-of-the-line model with impressive features, including all-wheel suspension, all-terrain wheels, separate folding seats and canopies, and 100-pound weight capacity
Has a patented one-step folding system
cons: It doesn't have an adapter for a car seat and it is quite costly

customer_reviews.title: Great for Outdoor use!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a double stroller for running, parks or any other outdoor activities then this is the stroller for you! I've got three kiddos (4, 2 & 10 mo) and needed something to go on runs/walks because my CitySelect was just not maneuverable on the paths. The jogger is so easy to steer and use and allows my larger 4 year old to sit comfortably when she gets tired. If you're looking for an indoors stroller (malls) then the CitySelect is preferred because it can fit through smaller areas whereas the Jogger will not. Our front door is larger so the stroller fits right through. Definitely look at measurements and what you want with the stroller before buying!!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Get it. Now.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. Baby Jogger has awesome products(I own the City Select too). They are quality strollers that will last through multiple kids and worth every penny. You'll understand what I mean after you get it and you're at Disney, your back doesnt hurt from pushing the damn thing all day, it turns on a dime and folds quick and easy when waiting for the bus stops. Just go ahead and save yourself, buy a baby Jogger over the cheap one you already have in your cart. Your welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Erin G

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! I like the option to have a longer visor over top, the see through windows and air vents on the side. I love how sturdy this stroller is and easily it rolls and moves. My cons are that I have to buy a console and front tray separately rather than it just being included. This is heavy and difficult to lug out of the trunk and unfold without practically dropping it. Overall compared to cheaper basic strollers, this is well made and I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy 225

customer_reviews.title: It’s Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s love and hate with this stroller. I love the Baby Jogger stroller, this is my second 500$ stroller in 6 years. But, this one needs improvements defiantly. First of all it’s Extremely HEAVY. I’m 5,9” and pretty strong and to lift this thing into my SUV it’s dreadful. When you fold the stroller there is lots of potential to scraping and scratching up so many different places of the stroller, it drives me crazy that this thing doesn’t fold inward, and can’t stand up on its own. Had I known these things I probably wouldn’t have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Best Stroller Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stroller. The bar in the middle makes it so both seats are secure. It is a large stroller, so it is bulky to get open and shut, as well as in and out of the car. It pushes smoothly and my kids enjoy sitting in it. My two biggest complaints with this stroller are 1) the handlebar doesn't adjust, and 2) the foot brake is hard to use with sandals. I knew both of these cons before purchasing. So glad that I did though! Well worth the price. I know this stroller will last!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller for walks and jogs
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller, it is so smooth and easy to maneuver. My baby girl is happy in it. Two peek a boo windows to see baby and a few mesh windows for air flow. The basket is okay size, big enough for the essentials. There is a mesh pocket in the back for a water bottle, phone and keys but no cup holder. The suspension is great. My only issue with this is that its heavy for me to carry and I still cant figure out how to keep it upright when folded.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Heavy for a regular stroller, but LIGHT for a jogging stroller. Love this stroller, but I wish it could stand up instead of having to lie it flat in my garage. Also the break is a littler harder to use, but honestly, if you're too good to bend down and use your hand on the days you wear flip flops, then you probably won't end up liking any stroller ever.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: A good double stroller for the price, smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: Good double stroller for the price. It’s not perfect (doesn’t allow a car seat to be attached, can tilt backwards more easily than other brands and is quite heavy to lift when putting in the trunk). But it’s well made and is a nice smooth ride around the local zoo and in the neighborhood. Seems quite maneuverable and a tad more compact than some other double strollers I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Junkulis

customer_reviews.title: Is there any customer service after I buy this thing!!!???
customer_reviews.text: The dang front wheel wobbles uncontrollably when I am walking!!!! Nobody seems to even write me back at this company when i am asking for replacement or the know how to fix the issue!!!! Can amazon please help me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Yi

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! It feels really well made and rides so smoothly. I had rented two different BOB double jogging strollers before buying this, and am happy I went with the Baby Jogger over the BOB. It feels more secure (maybe due to the bar down the center) - just wish the seats could sit slightly more upright.
customer_reviews.author: rosesk19

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the baby jogger summit x3 stroller in December 2017 and have been loving it since then! It is comfortable for my son and easy handling for me. Great shocks, an easy ride, good storage space, so many good qualities. It is a bit heavy (as are all good quality jogging strollers!) and seeing as our elevator does not fit the stroller when it is open, I am working on my arm muscles when we use it! The one handed fold is key and so very useful. I highly recommend this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Z

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: Love this as much as our single baby jogger summit X3! Built to last! We've been using our single for 4 years and it still looks and works great. We bought a used double to save money and realized that the Baby Jogger brand is worth the investment after the used one started falling apart. Very happy with it and I love how easy it is to fold up. My 4 year old and 2 year old are comfy in it for our daily jogs.
customer_reviews.author: Tenn. Mama

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I tried out a few double strollers before buying this one and have never looked back since buying this one! It's SO smooth and easy for taking the kids for walks and jogs, extremely maneuverable. The sun shades protect my kids from whatever angle the sun wants to shine from and each shade has 2 windows (with velcro covers for when you don't want to use them)! The only cons for this stroller is that it takes up some storage space and is heavy (but that is to be expected for what it is) and awkward to carry/open. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great double stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love this jogger. It folds super easy and is fairly compact for a double stroller. It feels very sturdy and durable. We have a BoB single stroller and I would purchase this over the Bob any day of the week The canopy is very large and provides ample amounts of coverage. It also comes with a rain poncho cover which is a nice touch. There is plenty of storage underneath that provides plenty of room for diaper bags, goodies, food, whatever. Again. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Steph

customer_reviews.title: It’s super easy for me to push being only 5’ 4” ...
customer_reviews.text: Smooth ride for both kids. It’s super easy for me to push being only 5’ 4” and super tiny. Would recommend this to anyone looking at a jogging stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pram. Folds super quickly and easily. Folds back out just as fast and simply too. Occupies very little space when collapsed. Small basket underneath is handy. Light weight makes it easy to push or jog with. Large wheels and suspension give it a nice ride and makes gutters and driveways a non-event. It is an excellent stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade for our other jogger stroller
customer_reviews.text: We had another stroller that died 11 months after we bought it. So we wanted one that could actually withstand being a proper jogger stroller and this one is great. Our daughter seems more comfortable without the front tires going bonkers like the previous stroller. There isn't much storage space but you wouldn't need much if you are going for a run. I really love the top coverage for when it's sunny as well. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Balambi

customer_reviews.title: On trail stroller
customer_reviews.text: So, I am using this stroller not to transport a baby. Check out the video where I am using it on a trail near Los Angeles. It easily carries all my camping gear. This was a a tough trail in Topanga State Park.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalStew

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stroller! It handles really well and has a smooth ride for the kiddos. My favorite part is there was an available attachment for my maxi cosi infant car seat to attach to the stroller. The only thing I wish it had is cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: RRC

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING
customer_reviews.text: Moves easily over beat up sidewalks SO SMOOTHLY. My 4 yr old and 1 yr old daughters sit comfortably and with room for my bag(s). Moved from the UPPA double to this and its just SO much better. Moms - invest in this!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mockaitis

customer_reviews.title: I really like this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stroller so far! It pushes very easily. It's a smooth ride. The canopy goes far down so my baby is covered from the sun. The negative is that it's heavy and doesn't stand upright when you collapse it. It's hard to put it in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy we got this for our 31/2 yr old boy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a certified stroller addict lol.. I'm happy we got this for our 31/2 yr old boy ..
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Filkins

customer_reviews.title: Best Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful stroller. A bit expensive but worth the money. Very sturdy and gives a smooth ride. Easy to push and the kids always fall asleep from the smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Bock

customer_reviews.title: Really love this jogger
customer_reviews.text: Really love this jogger. Pros: attractive design, middle bar so that prevents sagging, easy to push, easy to put together. Cons: heavy to carry, basket underneath is a bit shallow. You have to pay extra for cup storage or snack bar for stroller, doesn't always fold up too easily. Overall though I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: My 1 year old is too tall!
customer_reviews.text: Stroller was easy to assemble, looks nice. Unfortunately, my 1 year olds head is in the canopy and the compartment under the stroller is almost impossible to access. There’s about 4” of space to stuff a diaper bag into and a bar splits down the middle. The real deal breaker is the ridiculously low head space.
customer_reviews.author: M G

customer_reviews.title: Baby jogger just does it right. If you’re on the fence about the Summiy X3 double and another brand, choose Baby Jogger!
customer_reviews.text: We live our baby jogger Summit x3 double! My favorite features are the huge shades, the reclining seats, and the easy fold feature. The main reason I chose this over the other popular brand is because there is a bar diving the two seats that prevent sagging in the middle between seats, which is a popular complaint of the “other” brand. The only thing I wish it had is a car seat adapter. Otherwise, best jogging stroller ever!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: No excuses
customer_reviews.text: Inabsolutely love this stroller. So smooth and easy to maneuver. Assembly no problem. The quick fold feature is amazing! I'm using it for a 6 month old and tall 3 year old. It feels good to be back out there getting my run walk on!
customer_reviews.author: Tameka B.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for my daughter and her two little ones as she needed a jogging stroller. Opted for this one over the Bob version, after doing an exhaustive comparison. Baby Jogger won out and my daughter is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: DEHM

customer_reviews.title: Tires will not stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: The tires on this stroller were absolutely worthless. They immediately lost air after being pumped up. The stroller was also extremely difficult to fold up. I have the Baby Jogger City Mini gt, which has been put through the ringer for the past three years, and this double stroller was a true let down compared to that. Definitely a disappointing and EXPENSIVE purchase. I have returned the stroller and will do without for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey M

customer_reviews.title: kids love it, easy to fold up and unfold
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price. Rides smooth, kids love it, easy to fold up and unfold. Visors have excellent coverage. It's nice to be able to lock and unlock the front wheel without having to bend down and fiddle with the latch by the front wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice stroller!
customer_reviews.text: We ADORE this stroller. Sleek, smooth, and we expect to use it for many years to come! We live in Chicago where our sidewalks are not exactly even....our baby isn't jostled around while in this stroller. Not too heavy either. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! Every time I run, I run at least 7 miles. My kids are comfy and love riding in it. It's super smooth and easy to push. Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Christine gordon

customer_reviews.title: and this is by far the best. It's very study
customer_reviews.text: I wish we bought this earlier! We have owned four different strollers, and this is by far the best. It's very study, while still easy to push and maneuver. We live in the city so this is very important. It's also easy to fold and relatively compact when folded.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Guoting Fu

customer_reviews.title: Great for most all terrain
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, goes over rough paths easily. The handle in the seat that collapses the stroller as you life is convenient. Works great with our car seat after purchasing the car seat adapter. I imagine we'll get several years out of this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Bush

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller, I can maneuver it with one hand with a 33lb 3 year old and a 16lbs 9 month old. I have used it on roads and trails and it handles well on both. Only downside is that it’s a bit heavy and awkward to put in and out of the car, other than that, I have no regrets with this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: keh777

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best stroller we've ever owned. We were a little worried about the handlebar height for me, because I'm 6' 5", but it actually works fine - no issues. The legroom for jogging is great, the suspension, brakes and wheels are fantastic - it just does the job and does it well. We have three kids including a newborn, and this is already helping us go places as a family so much easier and more enjoyable than before when we had a cheaper all-terrain stroller that ended up with crooked wheels that made it hard to push.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! Very well made, the brakes are perfect, nice BIG shade to keep the sun off my boys. One of tires had the valve bend to the side and subsequently popped the tire so we had to order a new one. This was probably my fault with how I laid it in the trunk so I can't deduct because of that. Overall it's a great stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Presina

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: We love our baby jogger! We rented one on a trip in Florida and decided to buy when we got home. It’s easy to maneuver, lightweight, easy to break down, and store. It has a hand break and foot break, which is nice. The only problem is, if your children aren’t seated and you’re not holding on to it, if can tip backwards. Shouldn’t be a problem if you strap your kids in.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: No car seat adapter for the double
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. Unfortunately, it doesn’t have a car seat adapter. So I ended up purchasing a second stroller that fit the needs I required. Definitely disappointed I had to do that but I kept it (because I couldn’t sell it for the price I bought it) so I can use it when my infant is old enough.
customer_reviews.author: Britania Pereira

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Tires wouldn't keep air. The stroller veered to the left and wouldn't roll straight.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G.

customer_reviews.title: My child does not like this and constantly tries to get out as uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It looks sharp and folds well but the seat doesn't go to an upright position. My child does not like this and constantly tries to get out as uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Family treasure!  A tool that keeps on working.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best stroller I have ever used, well built good weight, pretty stable and glides! Brakes kinda suck.
customer_reviews.author: Erick/Karen

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is so luxurious to walk/run with. It ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is so luxurious to walk/run with. It seems very big at first, but I've been impressed by how well it gets around
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: That’s good for me and good for my baby,she’s so lucky
customer_reviews.author: zhang hui

customer_reviews.title: This has been great so far for our 7 mo twins
customer_reviews.text: This has been great so far for our 7 mo twins. It is very smooth but sometimes the wheel gets a little wonky. Also the back tire was going flat right away so baby jogger overnighted us a replacement which we appreciated a lot and it was super quick and easy to change the tire. The missing star is for those little things and also it's not always as quick and easy to fold and unfold it sticks sometimes- and lastly the stroller doesn't fit easily through all normal size doors it feels like if they made it half an inch narrower it would!! But still we are very happy with it and our babies seem to be too.
customer_reviews.author: sdwdc2015

customer_reviews.title: Despite the basket being somewhat small and not easily accessible, the stroller simply is wonderful and very ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely helpful! Despite the basket being somewhat small and not easily accessible, the stroller simply is wonderful and very useful!
customer_reviews.author: K&K

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller. Heavy but that’s expected with a double
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller. Heavy but that’s expected with a double. Folds easily. Easy to steer. The underneath storage is a bit hard to fit anything in.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stroller. Runs/jogs nicely even with the swivel, it's not shook on me once. And I've ran very long with it, 8 + miles with two kids different weights. Very smooth. My husband also loves it's smoothness. Definitely worth the money. I highly recommend this stroller if you run with your kiddos. The only downfall is the under carriage is small but I can live with that. It's perfect for what we need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about this thing. Some things are worth paying more. This is one of them. We’ve used it everywhere, including the beach.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Great for pushing on gravel and paved roads
customer_reviews.text: I’m so thankful for this stroller. If you can afford it, just buy it. It fits in my Nissan Sentra trunk! Great for pushing on gravel and paved roads, even off-roading in grass. Great for running but running with two kids in there is pretty boss. I’ve mostly been walking with it. My kids love it and even will nap in it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Josephsen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great all terrain stroller but difficult to maneuver once folded.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Harnish

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever! My daughter loves it. I love that on the days when shes not in the best mood, i can say wanna ride in your stroller and shes all about it. I wish i would have got it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: DarkVelvetRose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing handling for two kids
customer_reviews.text: Love my stroller! handles well. I love the hand brake, plenty of storage, stroller sits higher up than other doubles which I like
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and hard to fold by yourself without damaging. Extremely easy to maneuver though! Suspension is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kimmi

customer_reviews.title: After a year the front tire doesn't allow u to turn it only goes straight !
customer_reviews.text: I've had my stroller for a year and a half now. The front wheel no longer allows me to make it turn for walks, it only goes straight.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Cronin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Baby Jogger never fails to exceed my expectations. This stroller is easy to open and close. The ride is so smooth, very easy to push, great umbrella coverage for my munchkins. I love the extra storage on the back of both seats. When I am ready to downsize from a double I will definitely be purchasing the summit x3 single.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is excellent!! We live in the country and enjoy ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is excellent!! We live in the country and enjoy walking on trails in the woods. We also live on a dirt road and the stroller pushes easy over the road and grass. We love this stroller!! Its perfect for our twins. We will enjoy it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this stroller. Fits both children and shades them the way she likes.
customer_reviews.author: janiebelle

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this stroller. The only thing I'm not a fan of is that's it's very difficult to put things (like a baby bag) in the basket underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, fits the 3 year old with room to ...
customer_reviews.text: This met every expectation. It is smooth, sturdy, fits the 3 year old with room to spare and the 8 month old is nice and secure. Break system works great. Turns very well too.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan Sumpter

customer_reviews.title: Suspension is great, and really like the front wheel lock feature
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive, but you get what you pay for. Suspension is great, and really like the front wheel lock feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon puts the fun back in 🛒!
customer_reviews.text: Fair price and sweet stroller for our granddaughter! Sturdy and light, easy to maneuver and store away in the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L.

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. Easy to handle and the fact that you can take the wheels apart is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stroller for my 2 year old toddler. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller so far. Easy to assemble, but it is super heavy. I was expecting this though so no deductions for that
customer_reviews.author: Danett Rice

customer_reviews.title: We love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: We love this stroller, originally had the single one and liked it so much when we had our second child bought the double stroller. After a month of using it, the tire completely failed. So now we swap out the single stroller tire with the double stroller tire depending on if we are taking one kid or both kids on our run.
customer_reviews.author: Beth lane

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this stroller after a week of looking through reviews and what not, best stroller I've ever had! Doesn't fit through my doorway but is easily collapsible.It has shocks and plenty of room for both my kids and glides effortlessly. I can steer with one hand while drinking my coffee with the free one. THINK LUXURY 💕
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic .

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! Pushes so easily and smoothly. Love the handle brake for all of the hills in my neighborhood!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this jogger. Smooth ride for baby and easy to push.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I can’t say enough awesome things about this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough awesome things about this stroller. I previously had a different brand double jogger and upgraded to the BabyJogger Summit X3, and could not be happier. This thing fits through standard doorways! Folds so easily, pushes great. Brakes are easy, canopies are amazing. Everything is quality—it’s worth making the jump to BabyJogger if you are looking for something to jog with, as well as take for errands. With this and the BabyJogger rain cover, I couldn’t have a better daily jogging stroller solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Would get full house of stars buy it will not go in a straight line with the front wheel locked. Otherwise I find it strong and I'll be using it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Arnar

customer_reviews.title: Nice but heavy...
customer_reviews.text: I hart this stroller but it's a bit heavy and when u go to grab it out of the car it unfolds and busted my toe!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Bit heavy but very smooth when it comes to running. Easy to open and pack. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Chiang

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: If you are going you are going to go big on any one baby product, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of comparisons and am so happy we went with the Summit X3! Would def recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Does it lock into place while folded?
customer_reviews.text: How do you lock it into place to stay folded? What a pain to try and load and unload. I might retuen if it does not lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Baby Jogger Summit X3 Double Jogging Stroller - 2016 | Air-Filled Rubber Tires | All-Wheel Suspension | Quick Fold Jogging Stroller, Black/Gray
product_meta.description: Style:Double| Color:BlackThe Summit X3 offers exceptional performance and maneuverability on any terrain. This stroller and jogger hybrid is conveniently equipped with an all new remote swivel lock that is mounted on the handlebar. Simply flip the lever to lock the front wheel straight when you're off for a run or release to swivel mode in one step for walking without having to touch the front wheel. This tandem stroller features Baby Jogger's patented quick fold technology so you can fold the Summit X3 with one hand, the universal accessory mounting bracket to accessorize with ease, an improved all wheel independent suspension system and hand operated rear drum brakes offer increased control for added safety on hilly terrain. The Summit X3 sports 16" rear and 12" front quick release pneumatic tires, a padded seat that reclines to a near flat position and a vented seat top with weather cover to increase airflow within the jogging twin stroller when reclined. Also featured is a large adjustable sun canopy with peek a boo windows and side ventilation panels, an comfortable handlebar with wipe clean grip, a seat back storage compartment, a large under seat basket, adjustable five point safety harness with shoulder pads and a rear parking brake. The Summit X3 is a great solution for parents who want one stroller that does it all while maintaining all the style and safety you'd expect from Baby Jogger. Maximum weight capacity is 75 pounds . This vehicle is suitable from birth to 5 years Maximum weight: 50 lb./22.5 kilograms , Maximum height: 44 in./112 centimeters in each seat unit . Total weight load recommended for this stroller is 114 pounds/51.5 kilograms (50 pounds / 22.5 kilograms in each seat, 2 pounds /1 kilograms in each seat back pocket, 10 pounds/4.5 kilograms in basket)
feature_bullets: Patented quick fold technology allows you to fold your double jogging stroller in one step
16 inches rear and 12 inches front air filled tires with front wheel lock mounted on the handlebar for easy conversions between jogger and stroller mode
